resources.string: Would you like to receive advice tailored to your body type? The quiz below is for you:
Which gender do you identify yourself with:
Are your shoulders narrower than your hips?
Your body shape is inverted triangle
We need to place a few more questions to determine your body type...
Is your stomach round and bust full?
TOPS: show-off your slender upper body, create a fuller illusion at the right places to balance out the wider hips
BOTTOMS: focus on pants which make smaller your lower half. Dark colors, straight lines are best.
SHOES: wear heels to lengthen the figure
TOPS: Go for tops that lighten or slim down your upper half and minimize your broad shoulders, but without erasing your curves or the bust.
BOTTOMS: Aim to balace your upper half adding more curves.
You are taking the quiz for men body shapes. Your first question...
